programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: Guy Fieri challenges the seven remaining summer tournament chefs to make seafood sandwiches; the top-ranked sandwich wins an instant $5,000, and the bottom two chefs battle to see whose smoothie-inspired dish will save them from elimination.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: It's fun in the park for the six remaining chefs; the chefs partner up to create team picnic plates, with each teammate first shopping a different half of the store using picnic baskets; one chef will be eliminated.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
